programme.title: Oklahoma ends liquor ban
programme.short_synopsis: Last state to end prohibition will now allow liquor to be openly sold.
programme.medium_synopsis: Oklahoma - where prohibition ruled until 1959 - to finally allow liquor to be openly sold.
programme.long_synopsis:
Oklahoma - where prohibition ruled until 1959 - to finally allow liquor to be openly sold.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Oklahoma ends liquor ban

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
